title: log in screen wont load up!!!! help me someone
body:
my launch screen loads up but when i press the launch button it just drops out and nothing happens. it wont load up the log in screen.
it was working fine last night but after todays update it wont work.
any thoughts on how to fix this anyone?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds odd.

Could you try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if that helps.
